text: The Last Day () is a 1972 Soviet drama movie directed by Mikhail Ulyanov.Умереть в один день с мамой. О чём мечтал и во что верил Богдан СтупкаСамый последний день It stars Mikhail Ulyanov, Vyacheslav Nevinny, and Igor Kashintsev. ==Actors== * Mikhail Ulyanov as Kovalyov * Vyacheslav Nevinny as Stepan Danilovich Stepeshko * Igor Kashintsev as Grisha * Bohdan Stupka as Valery * Mikhail Zhigalov as lieutenant * Vladimir Nosik as Sergey == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Russian drama movies Category:1972 drama movies Category:Movies about police officers Category:Soviet drama movies
title: The Last Day (1972 movie)
